CustomField.description: Checked When Opp Stage is Closed Won and Quote Stage is Accepted
CustomField.formula: IF ( ( TEXT ( Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName ) == $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon && TEXT ( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ) == $Label.QuoteStageAccepted ) , true, false )
CustomField.label: Check Quote Is Accepted & Opp Is Won
